text: Dangshi,[wo] dui tamen shuo:“Nimen jiu zhu zai zhe zuo chengshi [yelusaleng] ba! Nimen ke suiyi chi cheng li de jiamei shiwu, nimen dang shuo:“[An la a!] Qiu ni kuanshu women de zuiguo!” Nimen dang fushou er jin cheng men [zhu], wo jiang kuanshu nimen de zuiguo, wo jiang zengjia xingshan zhe de baochou.”
